title: Bill Kristol
summary: William Kristol (/ˈkrɪstəl/; born December 23, 1952) is an American neoconservative writer.[1] A frequent commentator on several networks including CNN, he was the founder and editor-at-large[2] of the political magazine The Weekly Standard. Kristol is now editor-at-large of The Bulwark.[3]
